name: Covid Panic
description:
G'Day, 

Given what the current pandemic that is going on in the world. 

I wanted to create a fun little click base endless runner game about covid.

If you are working from home and need to kill time while in a meeting give Covid Panic a play 

Hope you all like, let me know if you have any ideas to make it better.

Stay tuned as i have a few other games coming very soon both endless runner style and platformer style.
